key_risks: Patent litigation and dependence on licensing revenue
Intense competition from larger semiconductor companies
Rapid technological shifts impacting product relevance
Legal and regulatory risks, including antitrust allegations
controversies: History of patent litigation, including cases like Rambus Inc. v. Nvidia
Allegations of antitrust behavior in standard-setting bodies
Shareholder lawsuits, such as In re Rambus, Inc. Securities Litigation
Allegations of unpaid labor and exploitation in AI-related projects
social_issues: Allegations of unpaid labor and exploitation in AI-related projects
governance_issues: Dependence on licensing revenue and associated legal risks
